title: Augusta County: Henry H. Dedrick to Mary E. A. Dedrick, May 10, 1863
summary: Dedrick describes the battle of Chancellorsville, the wounding and death of General Jackson, and the shortages plaguing his regiment, i.e. food and paper.
keywords: Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Desertion/Leave, Home Front, Family, Military Authority, American Civil War
